Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Ms. M.O
Reviews.Content: Purchased two cameras for my kids for their trip to Europe and have to say the swivel feature is great! They like taking pictures of themselves and emailing them to mommy so this is great. Picture quality is great and easy to use for 7 year olds.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Please avoid my mistake and don't waste your moneybattery runs out in no timeno audio on video recordingfrustrated child and parent
